howItWorks.title: How GiantyLive Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Four Simple Steps to Global Communication
howItWorks.description: Our AI-powered platform makes international conferences effortless

step1.title: Speak Naturally
step1.description: Simply speak in your native language during your conference. Our AI detects multiple speakers and languages automatically.

step2.title: AI Processing
step2.description: Advanced neural networks process your speech with context awareness, ensuring accurate translations that maintain meaning and nuance.

step3.title: Instant Translation
step3.description: Participants receive real-time translations in their preferred language through high-quality audio output or text display.

step4.title: Seamless Communication
step4.description: Experience natural conversation flow with ultra-low latency, making language barriers disappear completely.

visual.title: Real-Time Translation
visual.subtitle: Experience the magic of instant communication

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of professionals who trust GiantyLive for their international communication needs

testimonials.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
testimonials.content: GiantyLive transformed our international conference. Participants could communicate seamlessly regardless of their native language.

testimonials.name: Prof. Miguel Rodriguez
testimonials.content: The AI translation quality is exceptional. Our students from different countries can now participate fully in discussions.

testimonials.name: Lisa Thompson
testimonials.content: We've seen a 40% increase in international client engagement since implementing GiantyLive in our meetings.
